name: Generators
description:
In a world of energy crisis, when the lights go out there's only one person that can get the system back online... Well.. Really its the future so you send a drone to do the job- but someone has to pilot that drone. And that someone is you!

This puzzle game allows the player to spawn additional drones in order to restart the generators within the power plant. However, these drones move in unison and to restart the generators all ports must be in contact with a drone at the same time. 

Controls:

- WASD or Arrow keys to move

- [Space] spawn additional clones. *Note* the clone will spawn above the last clone spawned.

-[N] restart level

Installation:

1. Download .zip file

2. Uncompress file

3. Execute the "jjohnson_ProjectFinal.exe" file

4. Set your preferred resolution. *Note* It is recommended to play in windowed mode.

5. Click "Play" to start the game

**Dev Note**

- 05/08/2019: the current build for download is incomplete :( . In the final minutes of launch, player controls in the final build stopped working. This forced the decision to upload the previously functional build version. Once the issue is resolved, the final version will be available for download. Thank you for your patience :D
